subsetSelect

public BusinessObjectWithSelectList subsetSelect(Context context,
                                                 int index,
                                                 int count,
                                                 StringList selectStatements)
                                          throws MatrixException
Do a select on a subset of a Set. NOTE: Indices for subsets start at one (1) for the first object.
Parameters:
context - the context for this request
selectStatements - the StringList of select statements to be applied.
index - - where to start in the set.
count - - how many objects to get.
Returns:
BusinessObjectWithSelectList
Throws:
MatrixException - when unable to retrieve data from the BOS
Since:
ADK 9.0.0

subset

public BusinessObjectList subset(Context context,
                                 int index,
                                 int count,
                                 Visuals visuals)
                          throws MatrixException
Get a subset of a set. This is on a 'raw' set with no additional sorting. BusinessObjects are returned in the order that they are inserted into the Set. Any sorting of objects before insertion into the Set will be retained. NOTE: Indices for subsets start at one (1) for the first object.
Parameters:
context - the context for this request
index - - where to start in the set.
count - - how many objects to get.
visuals - the visuals to apply to the obects.
Returns:
BusinessObjectList
Throws:
MatrixException - when unable to retrieve data from the BOS
Since:
ADK 9.1.0

sort

public BusinessObjectList sort(Context context,
                               java.lang.String sortKey,
                               int direction,
                               int sortDataType,
                               boolean persistent,
                               Visuals visuals)
                        throws MatrixException
Sort a set.
Parameters:
context - the context for this request
sortKey - - String that holds the sort key.
direction - - direction of sort, defined in SortConstants.
sortDataType - - type of data to be sorted, integer, real, etc., defined in SortConstants.
persistent - - should the sorted set be stored in the DB.
visuals - the visuals to apply to the obects.
Returns:
BusinessObjectList
Throws:
MatrixException - when unable to retrieve data from the BOS
Since:
ADK 9.1.0
See Also:
SortConstants
